document_data.mainbody:
Elias Fischer was a commoner from the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Elias was a human man with a light skin tone and black hair and mustache.
In the , Anita and Elias Fischer suffered a terrible loss. The couples seven-year-old daughter Lily was murdered, leaving her parents grief-stricken. Anita and Elias planned on burying their daughter in the Lower City Graveyard, but the undertaker carpenter, Ulkov Sully, demanded a priority fee for a coffin due to a massive backlog of funerals caused by the skyrocketing numbers of murders in the Gate. Without paying the fee, something the Fischers could not do, it wouldve taken a month of wait time. Anita and her husband tried their best to get Lily buried via negotiations and demands from the Valmorba and her mortuary.
